welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Albano Laziale, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning views. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at the airport, dedicated to long-haul and intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
